entities.name: umbridge-itis
entities.description: The mysterious symptoms that the students are suffering from. (Excerpt: 'they were suffering “Umbridg e-itis.”')

entities.name: snackboxes
entities.description: Devices used by students to access food or other items. (Excerpt: 'But not even the users of the Snac kboxes could compete with that master of chaos, Peeves')

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: A poltergeist who is causing chaos in the school. (Excerpt: 'Cackling ma dly, he soared through the school...')

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Someone who gave Peeves some parting words that he took to heart. (Excerpt: 'who seem ed to have taken Fred’s parting words deeply to heart')

entities.name: mrs. norris
entities.description: A teacher who is being shut inside suits of armor by Peeves. (Excerpt: 'Twice he shut Mrs. Norris inside suits of armor')

entities.name: caregiver
entities.description: The person responsible for rescuing Mrs. Norris from the suits of armor. (Excerpt: 'from which she was rescued, yowling loudly, by the furious caretaker')

relationships.description: Peeves seems to have taken Fred's parting words deeply to heart. (Excerpt: 'who seem ed to have taken Fred’s parting words deeply to heart')
Peeves shut Mrs. Norris inside suits of armor twice. (Excerpt: 'Twice he shut Mrs. Norris inside suits of armor')
The caregiver rescued Mrs. Norris from the suits of armor. (Excerpt: 'from which she was rescued, yowling loudly, by the furious caretaker')
